attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: This app makes me cry because of how terrible it is. I would not recommend it to ANYONE, I do recommend that you rate it a one star though because of how terrible it is :)

attributes.title: Keeps crashing 🤦🏾‍♂️
attributes.review: Literally the worst app I ever downloaded. Definitely can’t Handle my iPhone like he can’t handle being a decent president 🥱 1.7 stars

attributes.title: Crash, crashing, crashed!
attributes.review: Ugh... this app caused my devices to crash repeatedly.  I also am concerned it was created to be a fake Trump app to steal my information.

attributes.title: It takes to long to download
attributes.review: It a really bad app it takes to long to setup and download I don’t recommend

attributes.title: Horrible app✨🌸🌊😡
attributes.review: When I opened it, it wanted all my photos and all my info 😭😭😭🤢🤢🤢🤢🧚🏼‍♂️🧚🏼‍♂️🧚🏼‍♂️🧚🏼‍♂️🧚🏼‍♂️please save me from the Cheeto monster this app made my head hurt please stop✨🧚🏼‍♂️🌸🌊 i am very disappointed ☹️

attributes.title: Waste of time
attributes.review: This app doesn’t even work, it’s disgusting it added sooo many viruses in my phone including Trump’s face on it. It was horrendous and it’s also useless.

attributes.title: This app is terrible
attributes.review: When I opened the app I saw the ugliest man I have ever seen in my life. My eyes started burning and I got a seizure. Thank god I lived but this app is the worst app I have ever used anyways that’s all😌👎🏼

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: It kept glitching out everytime I tried to learn something about the president, it also had terrible  music when you entered the app.

attributes.title: Worst app everrrrr‼️
attributes.review: Okay so I heard a lot of great things about this app and then it totally just glitched out. I mean it could be the excess amount of racism, sexism, homophobia, and rapist tendencies our Cheeto of a president alludes, but who know 🤷🏾‍♀️, this app is trash!!

attributes.title: Bad
attributes.review: This app is bad it’s full of adds that have nothing to do with trump and all they want is your money save your time and don’t download it
